affective.core

Class NegationEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • affective.core.LexiconEvaluator
      • affective.core.NegationEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NegationEvaluator
extends LexiconEvaluator
    This class is used for counting the number of negation words in a tweet.

    Version:

    Author:
    Felipe Bravo-Marquez (fjb11@students.waikato.ac.nz)
